name: Spikey-Wikey.exe
description:
Something is happening at the Golden Oak Library.

Join Spikey-Wikey to see what's up in this Luna Game inspired MLP fan game!

CONTROLS:

  • A and D (or Left and Right Arrow Keys) = Move
  • W (or Up Arrow Key) = Enter Doors
  • Spacebar = Jump

Disclaimer: Contains Loud Noises, Viewer discretion is advised.
